verses.verse: <S%H6965>Arise<s%>, <S%H215>shine<s%>; for your <S%H216>light<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%>, and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is risen upon <S%H2224>you<s%>.

<S%H2822>For<s%>, behold, the darkness shall <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and gross <S%H6205>darkness<s%> the <S%H3816>people<s%>: but the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H2224>arise<s%> upon <S%H3519>you<s%>, and his glory shall be seen upon <S%H7200>you<s%>.
And the <S%H1471>Nations<s%> shall <S%H1980>come<s%> to your <S%H216>light<s%>, and <S%H4428>kings<s%> to the <S%H5051>brightness<s%> of your <S%H2225>rising<s%>.

Lift <S%H5375>up<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, and <S%H7200>see<s%>: all they gather themselves <S%H6908>together<s%>, they <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H1121>you<s%>: your sons shall <S%H935>come<s%> from <S%H7350>far<s%>, and your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> shall be <S%H539>nursed<s%> at your <S%H6654>side<s%>.

Then you shall <S%H7200>see<s%>, and flow <S%H5102>together<s%>, and your <S%H3824>heart<s%> shall <S%H6342>fear<s%>, and be <S%H7337>enlarged<s%>; because the <S%H1995>abundance<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> shall be <S%H2015>converted<s%> unto <S%H2428>you<s%>, the forces of the <S%H1471>Nations<s%> shall come unto <S%H935>you<s%>.

The <S%H8229>multitude<s%> of <S%H1581>camels<s%> shall <S%H3680>cover<s%> <S%H1070>you<s%>, the dromedaries of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> and <S%H5891>Ephah<s%>; all they from <S%H7614>Sheba<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%>: they shall <S%H5375>bring<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H3828>incense<s%>; and they shall show <S%H1319>forth<s%> the <S%H8416>praises<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

All the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> of <S%H6938>Kedar<s%> shall be gathered <S%H6908>together<s%> unto <S%H352>you<s%>, the rams of <S%H5032>Nebaioth<s%> shall <S%H8334>minister<s%> unto <S%H5927>you<s%>: they shall come up with <S%H7522>acceptance<s%> on my <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and I will <S%H6286>glorify<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H8597>glory<s%>.
Who are these that <S%H5774>fly<s%> as a <S%H5645>cloud<s%>, and as the <S%H3123>doves<s%> to their <S%H699>windows<s%>?

Surely the <S%H339>islands<s%> shall <S%H6960>wait<s%> for <S%H591>me<s%>, and the ships of <S%H8659>Tarshish<s%> <S%H7223>first<s%>, to <S%H935>bring<s%> your <S%H1121>sons<s%> from <S%H7350>far<s%>, their <S%H3701>silver<s%> and their <S%H2091>gold<s%> with <S%H8034>them<s%>, unto the name of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, and to the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, because he has glorified <S%H6286>you<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5236>strangers<s%> shall build <S%H1129>up<s%> your <S%H2346>walls<s%>, and their <S%H4428>kings<s%> shall <S%H8334>minister<s%> unto <S%H7110>you<s%>: for in my wrath I <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H7522>you<s%>, but in my favor have I had mercy on <S%H7355>you<s%>.

Therefore your <S%H8179>gates<s%> shall be <S%H6605>open<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%>; they shall not be <S%H5462>shut<s%> <S%H3119>day<s%> nor <S%H3915>night<s%>; that men may <S%H935>bring<s%> unto you the <S%H2428>forces<s%> of the <S%H1471>Nations<s%>, and that their <S%H4428>kings<s%> may be <S%H5090>brought<s%>.
For the <S%H1471>nation<s%> and <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> that will not <S%H5647>serve<s%> you shall <S%H6>perish<s%>; <S%H1471>Yes<s%>, those nations shall be <S%H2717>utterly<s%> <S%H2717>wasted<s%>.

The <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> unto <S%H1265>you<s%>, the fir tree, the pine <S%H8410>tree<s%>, and the <S%H8391>box<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>, to <S%H6286>beautify<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> of my <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%>; and I will make the <S%H4725>place<s%> of my <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H3513>glorious<s%>.

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> also of them that <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> you shall <S%H1980>come<s%> <S%H7817>bending<s%> unto <S%H5006>you<s%>; and all they that despised you shall bow themselves <S%H7812>down<s%> at the <S%H3709>soles<s%> of your <S%H7272>feet<s%>; and they shall <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H5892>you<s%>, The city of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, The <S%H6726>Zion<s%> of the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

<S%H8478>Whereas<s%> you have been <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> and <S%H8130>hated<s%>, so that no man went <S%H5674>through<s%> <S%H7760>you<s%>, I will make you a <S%H5769>eternal<s%> <S%H1347>excellency<s%>, a <S%H4885>joy<s%> of <S%H1755>many<s%> <S%H1755>generations<s%>.

You shall also <S%H3243>suck<s%> the <S%H2461>milk<s%> of the <S%H1471>Nations<s%>, and shall <S%H3243>suck<s%> the <S%H7699>breast<s%> of <S%H4428>kings<s%>: and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> am your <S%H3467>Savior<s%> and your <S%H1350>Redeemer<s%>, the mighty <S%H46>One<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>.

For <S%H5178>brass<s%> I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and for <S%H1270>iron<s%> I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and for <S%H6086>wood<s%> <S%H5178>brass<s%>, and for <S%H68>stones<s%> <S%H1270>iron<s%>: I will also <S%H7760>make<s%> your <S%H6486>officers<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%>, and your <S%H5065>exactors<s%> <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>.

<S%H2555>Violence<s%> shall no more be <S%H8085>heard<s%> in your <S%H776>land<s%>, <S%H7701>wasting<s%> nor <S%H7667>destruction<s%> inside your <S%H1366>borders<s%>; but you shall <S%H7121>call<s%> your <S%H2346>walls<s%> <S%H3444>Salvation<s%>, and your <S%H8179>gates<s%> <S%H8416>Praise<s%>.

The <S%H8121>sun<s%> shall be no more your <S%H216>light<s%> by <S%H3119>day<s%>; neither for <S%H5051>brightness<s%> shall the <S%H3394>moon<s%> give <S%H216>light<s%> unto <S%H3068>you<s%>: but the Lord shall be unto you a <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H215>light<s%>, and your <S%H430>God<s%> your <S%H8597>glory<s%>.

Your <S%H8121>sun<s%> shall no more go <S%H935>down<s%>; neither shall your <S%H3391>moon<s%> <S%H622>withdraw<s%> <S%H3068>itself<s%>: for the Lord shall be your <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H216>light<s%>, and the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H60>mourning<s%> shall be <S%H7999>ended<s%>.

Your <S%H5971>people<s%> also shall be all <S%H6662>righteous<s%>: they shall <S%H3423>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>, the <S%H5342>branch<s%> of my <S%H4302>planting<s%>, the <S%H4639>work<s%> of my <S%H3027>hands<s%>, that I may be <S%H6286>glorified<s%>.

A little <S%H6996>one<s%> shall become a <S%H505>thousand<s%>, and a small <S%H6810>one<s%> a <S%H6099>strong<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%>: I the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H2363>hasten<s%> it in his <S%H6256>time<s%>.
